dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 1128 IH: Rural Health Care Access Act of 2023
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Green of Tennessee introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Ways and Means

form.official-title: To amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to permit States to designate without any mileage limitations facilities that are located in rural areas as critical access hospitals.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Rural Health Care Access Act of 2023.

subsection.text: Section 1820 of the Social Security Act (42 U.S.C. 1395i–4) is amended—

subparagraph.text: by striking , and that— and inserting a semicolon; and

paragraph.text: in subsection (h)(3), by inserting made before the date of the enactment of the Rural Health Care Access Act of 2023 after any redesignation.

subsection.text: The amendment made by subsection (a)(1) shall apply with respect to any designation or redesignation made on or after the date of the enactment of this Act.
